Reviews.Title: “Mice Mice Mice”
Reviews.Author: antMiami_Florida
Reviews.Content: Great Location near Metro Sol Subway and Square lots of shops and Restaurants . i would take the hop on hop off bus tour to get to know the area you can buy your pass in the Square or at the apt office . i found the staff very help full nice terraces with great views .the only thing was that we did have mice in our apt and the manager did not believe us so we had to kill one and dump it on her desk but after that they took care of the Mice and all was well with my stay . i would stay here again . you can take the subway to the airport and to and from all the train stations a great way to get around the city . oh one more thing exchange your money before you travel here the exchange rate is very high ....

Reviews.Title: “Better the second time around!”
Reviews.Author: RosEli_12
Reviews.Content: Great location, recently remodeled,close to the action and yet, peacefull (4th floor with a terrace;awsome in summer time!). This is our 2nd time, with our family. They only clean once a week, but you can pay extra for more, and they give you fresh towels and paper towel at the reception, anytime. 24 hr.service and security.

Reviews.Title: “Really good one”
Reviews.Author: IndianaT
Reviews.Content: I must say this is one of the best accommodation you can find in Madrid. It's literally few steps from Puerta del Sol, that means the heart of the city. We did have the chance to stay in the superior apartment with the terraces on the rooftop, with a superb view on the city skyline. The apartment was made by two big main rooms, a kitchen, a big living room and two bathrooms, all furnished with style and simple elegance. The prices are quite low considering what they offer. There's free wifi naturally.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome location - worth it!”
Reviews.Author: Babyface777
Reviews.Content: My friend and myself decided to booked this apartment for it's location. We were surprised how friendly the staffs are, clean apartment and working appliances. The apartment is all near the tourist areas. So many restaurants around, shopping are great too! I will definetely recommend this place. Worth every Euro we spent! Thanks! :)E

Reviews.Title: “Great location, old hotel”
Reviews.Author: lisajanea
Reviews.Content: Great location, really close to the centre. Got upgraded to a nicer apartment but still quite expensive for what it was. Girl at the check-in counter was amazingly helpful and WiFi was free. Didn't appriciate a step ladder and bucket and mop in the tiny bathroom. It was clean and served its purpose but was an old hotel that creaked quite a bit and couldn't get a good night's sleep.

Reviews.Title: “very good with childs”
Reviews.Author: familytravelers34
Reviews.Content: For our holidays I was a bit worried as we have two childs and I didn’t like to stay in a hotel with them: Apartments Mayor Centro are a good option especially for families, as you stay right in the centre of Madrid, in a very quiet flat. It has been very useful to have a kitchen available for all the needs of our Childs. And a dining-room with sofa and tv, as you are not forced to go out sightseeing all day long.

Reviews.Title: “very nice apartments”
Reviews.Author: Dave199
Reviews.Content: I stayed there a couple of times, and it has been a good choice, especially if you travel vith family.Very clean , and in the core of the historic centre

HotelInfo.Name: Apartamentos Mayor Centro
HotelInfo.Address: Esparteros, 6, 28012 Madrid, Spain
